Haval has made a solid effort here and it is very good, just great. Overall, the H2 is comfy, easy to live with, and largely quiet for cruising around in, be that a quick dash across town or a longer-distance drive on the open road.Haval claims an average fuel economy figure of 7.5 L/100 km even when we engaged the Economy drive mode and adopted a measured driving style.
